cmb_routing_number_type.xpath: //input[contains(@aria-controls,"list") and contains(@aria-controls,"BankCodeType") and contains(@aria-controls,"Identification") and contains(@aria-controls,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]

txb_routing_number.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"RegistrationNum") and contains(@id,"Identification") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]

txb_bank_account_number.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"AccountNum") and contains(@id,"Identification") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]

txb_CIN.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"BankCIN") and contains(@id,"Identification") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]

txb_SWIFT_code.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"SWIFTNo") and contains(@id,"Identification") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]

txb_IBAN.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"BankIBAN") and contains(@id,"Identification") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]

txb_expiration_date.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"ExpiryDate") and contains(@id,"Status") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]

txb_status.xpath: //input[contains(@id,"input") and contains(@id,"currentBankAccountStatus") and contains(@id,"M") and contains(@id,"Status") and contains(@id,"VendBankAccounts") and  1]
